errors.target_not_found: The given member is not in this guild.
errors.user_grater: Cannot select user with higher or equal role.
errors.user_greater_perms: Cannot select user with higher or equal permissions.

errors.no_plugin_settings: No plugin settings have been initialized yet.

common.success: The plugin has been successfully configured.

joinroles.description:
‚ùì Select the roles that will be automatically granted to all users that log in to the server.
 
üí° You can change this anytime using the {{- command}} command.
joinroles.placeholder: Select one or more server roles

description.what_are: Tickets are a quick and easy way to get support from the Staff Team, you can ask questions, discuss problems and request information of all kinds.
description.how_to: To create a ticket, click on the \"Create ticket\" button and go to the channel specified when creating the ticket. On behalf of the team, we ask that when you create your ticket, you write down your situation or question, to expedite the process.

newticket.description: Welcome to your ticket {{user}}, a staff member will contact you soon. For now, we ask you to describe your situation, question or complaint, so we can work better.

tickets.close_ticket: Your ticket will be deleted {{- time}}.

errors.already_claimed: This ticket is already claimed by {{- user}}.

claim.from_now: From now on, {{user}} will be in charge of this ticket.

errors.already_closed: This ticket is already getting deleted...

rename.success: The ticket has been renamed correctly.

tickets.success: Your ticket has been successfully created in {{- channel}}.

ticketoptions.description: For ticket administrators, with these options they can manage the ticket. Transcribe the ticket, lock it, rename it, and more with the buttons below.

lang.success: The language has been established to {{- lang}}.

errors.no_topic: No topic is set or unavailable.

github.title: Open Source Information
github.description:
This **wonderful** bot is made so that anyone can use it, this bot is a product of a lot of dedication and love. It is for this reason that it is now an opensource bot!
 
> If you have knowledge in the development of Discord bots, don't hesitate to collaborate in it! Go to the official Eclipse server for more information about the GitHub repository!

errors.no_command: No command found with the name `{{command}}`.

help.title: Eclipse Help Menu
help.description:
Transform your discord server to a place full of creativity and professionalism with unique plugins! 
These are the commands you can use:

errors.missing_permissions: Missing permissions to addrole to {{- user}}.

addrole.success: The role {{role}} has been correctly granted to {{- user}}.

errors.missing_permissions: Missing permissions to removerole to {{- user}}.

removerole.success: The role {{role}} has been correctly removed to {{- user}}.

errors.missing_permissions: Missing permissions to ban user {{- user}}.

ban.banned_from:
You have been banned from **{{guild}}**.
 
**Reason:**
> {{reason}}
 
You were banned by {{- user}}.
ban.success:
The user {{user}} has been banned successfully.
### Reason:
```{{reason}}```

errors.missing_permissions: Missing permissions to clear messages in {{- channel}}.

clear.success: Successfully deleted **${messages.size}** messages from the channel.

errors.missing_permissions: Missing permissions to kick user {{- user}}.

kick.success:
The user {{user}} has been kicked successfully.
### Reason:
```{{reason}}```

lock.success: The channel {{channel}} has been successfully locked.

mute.success: The user {{user}} has been successfully muted on the server.

errors.missing_permissions: Missing permissions to report user {{- user}}.

report.success: Your report has been sent successfully.

errors.missing_permissions: Missing permissions to temporarily ban {{- user}}.

tempban.success:
The user {{user}} has been temporarily banned successfully.
The ban will be cancelled <t:{{expiresAt}}:R>
### Reason:
```{{reason}}```

errors.missing_permissions: Missing permissions to temporarily mute {{- user}}.

tempmute.success:
The user {{user}} has been temporarily muted successfully.
The mute will be cancelled <t:{{expiresAt}}:R>.

errors.missing_permissions: Missing permissions to temporarily addrole to {{- user}}.

temprole.success:
The user {{user}} has the role {{role}} temporarily.
The role will be removed <t:{{expiresAt}}:R>.

timeout.success:
The user {{user}} has been timeout successfully.
The timeout will be cancelled <t:{{expiresAt}}:R>
### Reason:
```{{reason}}```

errors.id_no_valid: The ID you provided is invalid or does not exist, try using another one.
errors.no_ban: No ban has been found related to the ID you provided, try using another ID.

unban.success:
The user {{user}} has been timeout successfully.
### Reason:
```{{reason}}```

unmute.success: The user {{user}} has been successfully unmuted on the server.

untimeout.success:
The user {{user}} has been untimeout successfully.
### Reason:
```{{reason}}```

unlock.success: The channel {{channel}} has been successfully unlocked.
